article_title: Patent Protections Within The TPP Aren't Unprecedented, They're What American Innovators Deserve

article_metadata.author: Doug Schoen

og.description: Supreme Court rulings on gay marriage and Obamacare subsidies overshadowed the fact that Congress finally granted President Obama fast-track authority over the Trans-Pacific Partnership (TPP) and other trade negotiations. As such, upon the TPP agreement’s finalization, Congress will now simply give an up or down vote on its implementation. This is [...]
